contents.name: manufacturer
contents.description: Company name of the device manufacturer. This could be the same as the name of the original equipment manufacturer (OEM). Ex. Espressif.

contents.name: swVersion
contents.description: Version of the software on your device. This could be the version of your firmware. Ex. 1.0.0.

contents.name: osName
contents.description: Name of the operating system on the device. Ex. FreeRTOS.

contents.name: processorArchitecture
contents.description: Architecture of the processor on the device. Ex. Xtensa.

contents.name: processorManufacturer
contents.description: Name of the manufacturer of the processor on the device. Ex. Xtensa.

contents.name: totalStorage
contents.description: Total available storage on the device in kilobytes. Ex. 2048000 kilobytes.

contents.name: totalMemory
contents.description: Total available memory on the device in kilobytes. Ex. 256000 kilobytes.
